name: ohm
description: an object-oriented language for parsing and pattern matching

scripts.build-min: browserify src/main.js -s ohm -o dist/_ohm.js && uglifyjs dist/_ohm.js -o dist/ohm.min.js && rm dist/_ohm.js
scripts.build: npm run build-debug && npm run build-min
scripts.build-ohm-grammar: npm test && npm run unsafe-build-ohm-grammar && npm test
scripts.unsafe-build-ohm-grammar: cp dist/ohm-grammar.js dist/ohm-grammar.js.old; (cat src/ohm-grammar-prelude.txt; node src/ohm-cmd.js src/ohm-grammar.ohm) > dist/ohm-grammar.js.new && mv dist/ohm-grammar.js.new dist/ohm-grammar.js
scripts.prepublish: npm test && npm run build && npm run unsafe-build-ohm-grammar

author: Alex Warth <alexwarth@gmail.com> (http://tinlizzie.org/~awarth)
